name: get_stations_within_1_km
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ev_charging_stations.
Tool description: Electric vehicle charging stations full information.
API description: Fetch the nearest EV charging stations within a 1 km radius from a given latitude and longitude.

region.description: The region code (us for United States, ca for Canada, uk for United Kingdom, nz for New Zealand, hk for Hong Kong).

latitude.description: The latitude of the location for which to find nearby charging stations.

longitude.description: The longitude of the location for which to find nearby charging stations.
